Package io.github.xnovo3000.eventus.api.service

Interface EventService

public interface EventService
Service class that handles all the operations regarding events

      Returns:

      @NotNull @NotNull List<EventCardDto> getOngoingEvents()
      Get all events that started but not finished yet, ordered by start date descending
      Returns:

    • getFutureEvents

      @NotNull @NotNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<EventCardDto> getFutureEvents(int pageNumber)
      Get a page of events that haven't started yet, ordered by start date descending
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - The page number of the paginated result - starts from 1
      Returns:
      A page of future events

    • getProposedEvents

      @NotNull @NotNull org.springframework.data.domain.Page<EventCardDto> getProposedEvents(int pageNumber)
      Get a page of events that are in the 'proposed' state (not started but not accepted from an EVENT_MASTER), ordered by start date descending
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - The page number of the paginated result - starts from 1
      Returns:
      A page of proposed events

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Get all events that current user participated ordered by start date descending
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - The page number of the paginated result - starts from 1
      Returns:
      A page of events

    • proposeEvent

      @NotNull @NotNull Optional<Long> proposeEvent(@NotNull @NotNull ProposeEventDtoZoned proposeEventDto)
      Create a new unapproved event. The event start must be before end and after now
      Parameters:
      proposeEventDto - The event DTO
      Returns:
      The created event ID

    • approveEvent

      boolean approveEvent(long eventId)
      Approve an event by its ID, the event must be non-approved and start must be after now
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      Returns:
      True if the event can be approved, false otherwise

    • rejectEvent

      boolean rejectEvent(long eventId)
      Reject an event by its id, the event must be non-approved
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event id
      Returns:
      True if the event can be rejected, false otherwise

    • subscribeUserToEvent

      boolean subscribeUserToEvent(long eventId, @NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Subscribe a user to an event, fail if: the username does not exist, the event does not exist, the event is full, the event is not approved, the user is already subscribed, the event start is before now, user is subscribed to another event with same time
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      username - The user's username
      Returns:
      True if has been subscribed, false otherwise

    • unsubscribeUserToEvent

      boolean unsubscribeUserToEvent(long eventId, @NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Unsubscribe a user to an event, fails if: the username does not exist, the event does not exist, the event is not approved, the user is already unsubscribed the event start is before now
      Parameters:
      eventId - The event ID
      username - The user's username
      Returns:
      True if has been unsubscribed, false otherwise

    • rateEvent

      boolean rateEvent(long eventId, @NotNull @NotNull RateFormDto dto, @NotNull @NotNull String username)
      Rate a finished event, fails if: the username does not exist, the event does not exist, the event is not approved, the event is not finished, the user is not subscribed to the event, the event has already been rated
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event
      dto - The dto
      username - The user that wants to rate the event
      Returns:
      True if the event has been rated, false otherwise

    • deleteOldUnapprovedEvents

      boolean deleteOldUnapprovedEvents()
      Batch operation to remove old unapproved events and clean the database
      Returns:
      True if success, false otherwise
